ipos.name: Vidya Wires IPO
ipos.description: Vidya Wires is a leading manufacturer of industrial wires and cables. The company has a strong presence in the domestic market with cutting-edge manufacturing facilities.
ipos.companyInfo: Vidya Wires Limited is engaged in manufacturing electrical wires and cables for industrial and residential purposes.

ipos.name: Aequs Limited IPO
ipos.description: Aequs Limited specializes in precision engineering and aerospace components manufacturing with global clients.
ipos.companyInfo: Aequs is a global precision manufacturing company serving aerospace, automotive, and consumer durables industries.

ipos.name: ABC Technologies IPO
ipos.description: ABC Technologies is a software development company specializing in AI and machine learning solutions.
ipos.companyInfo: ABC Technologies provides cutting-edge AI/ML solutions to enterprises across various sectors.

ipos.name: Green Energy Corp IPO
ipos.description: Green Energy Corp is focused on renewable energy solutions including solar and wind power.
ipos.companyInfo: Green Energy Corp develops and operates renewable energy projects across India.

ipos.name: Metro Retail IPO
ipos.description: Metro Retail operates a chain of retail stores across tier-2 and tier-3 cities in India.
ipos.companyInfo: Metro Retail runs 50+ stores offering grocery and consumer goods.

ipos.name: Mega Pharma IPO
ipos.description: Mega Pharma is a pharmaceutical company focused on generic drugs and research.
ipos.companyInfo: Mega Pharma manufactures and distributes pharmaceutical products globally.
